name: Minimalistic Notion Bio Template

features: How will I receive this template?This is onNotion. After your purchase, you will have a link directed to the guide.; How do I use it?As long as you have a Notion account, all you have to do is download the page and hit duplicate at the top right of the template.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes! It works the same; How do I contact you if I have a question?You can write to myemail, or find me onTwitterif you have further questions!
